definitions.definition: a person engaged or qualified in a profession.
examples: professionals such as lawyers and surveyors

definitions.definition: a person engaged in a specified activity, especially a sport or branch of the performing arts, as a main paid occupation rather than as a pastime.
examples: professional player, paid player, salaried player; pro his first season as a professional

definitions.definition: a person competent or skilled in a particular activity.
examples: she was a real professional on stage
synonyms: crackerjack "she was a real professional on stage"
